item.description:
Are you missing out on the real estate investing opportunities?

Has the ever-changing landscape of the world of real estate investing ever got you down? Have you done everything correct and you still haven't gotten the deal? Are you getting the deals that are truly deals? Are you missing out? Have you been the recipient of the "highest and best" far too many times? Join us this month as we break down the minutia. We will have active members sharing how they made it happen for them. See  you there!!!

 

What you will learn:

How we analyze the volume of opportunities that cross our desk

Where we are finding the leads

How to maximize and monetize

How to structure the deals

How to position yourself to be in the game

If you are new to this business, you don't want to miss this. If you have been in the real estate investor business for years, you will want to hear what others are doing and how!

group.name: EMREIA-Eastern Mass Real Estate Investors Assoc.

item.name: Eastern Mass REIA Monthly Event In Taunton
